title: Create your Flag
description:
Time to show your true colors. Your campsite is shaping up, and as the campsite’s leader you need to make a flag. We’ve got you started with the basics for a flag and flagpole, but it is up to you to to make it your own.  
You can look to other flags for inspiration. Countries like France, Nigeria, Sweden, and Switzerland all have very simple color and shape designs, while Spain, Brazil, Kenya, and Saudi Arabia all feature complex designs. When you are done, share your flag to lay claim to your little bit of land!
completion_text: You have a white espace de travail in front of you, use it wisely. Create the most amazing flag the world has ever seen!

steps.hint: Dessine the sky where the flag will flutter - **tape** `background blue`
Définis the stroke to 0, to avoid drawing lines - **tape** `stroke 0`
Let's move the cursor to place our flagpole in the correct place - **tape** `moveTo 100, 100`
Définis the `color` of the flagpole to `darkgray`
Dessine a long, thin pole with a rectangle - **tape** `rectangle 10, 400`
Déplace-toi the cursor to place a ball on top-centre of the flagpole - **tape** `move 5`
Définis the `color` of the ornament to `gold`
Dessine un cercle de taille 8 - in a new line **tape** `circle 8`
Now move the cursor to start drawing our flag - **tape** `moveTo 115, 123`
Définis the `color` of the flag to `white`
Dessine the flag with a `rectangle` of size `261` and  `171`
That flag needs something to hold of to - **tape** `moveTo 100, 140`
Définis the `color` of the holder to `brown`
Dessine the holder with a `20` by `5` `rectangle`
Now is your turn! Dessine an amazing pattern on it - **tape** `moveTo 120, 125`
